name: Professional Communication in French (Oral)
description: This course is designed to strengthen oral communication skills in French and develop intercultural competence for a variety of career paths including public relations, international development, federal and provincial government. Students will acquire expertise in spoken French through in-class activities supported by multimedia: interviews, professional presentations, and debates. The course is not open to fluent or native speakers of French.
exclusions: Any FSL 400-level course. Not open to fluent or native speakers of French.
